channel.title: hugo on My Personal Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on My Personal Webpage

item.title: Org + Hugo + Cloudflare for personal blog
item.description: Hugo Quick setup Ox-Hugo Source of documentation: ox-hugo manual for init.el Backlink 1(use-package ox-hugo 2 :after ox) Handing in org.file I use one-page-per-post way to manage the post, the heading section looks the following: 1#+TITLE: 2#+AUTHOR: Chloe 3#+DATE: 2022-10-28 4#+HUGO_SECTION: posts 5#+HUGO_BASE_DIR:~/Blog 6#+HUGO_TAGS: 7#+EXPORT_HUGO_CATEGORIES: 8#+hugo_weight: auto 9#+HUGO_DRAFT: true 10#+hugo_auto_set_lastmod: t I use YASnipeet to generate the head section, so the date will be autogenerated to be the current date. Be aware that in ox-hugo, HUGO_BASE_DIR is mandentory, it determines where the root directory the exported .
